message: The dev .apk is available here: starboardland.com/convore/Convore.apk
Hey guys, I've been working on a new convore Android app I'd like to get feedback on.
Any feedback and bug reports are appreciated. The graphics and layout are still under development, and posting is currently disabled.
And you need to do your api calls async.  The UI locks up
neat.  ugly, but functional.  Fonts could be smaller and you should add swipe right to go back from topic -> group -> main screen
Also, after I read a topic, it was still marked as unread on the main page.
maybe different background colors on the counters if it's 0 or > 0
Thanks for the feedback... all those things were on the to-do list... that app took me about 2 hours to throw together.
